<url>http://www.globalsecurity.org/logo5.gif</url>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org</link>    </image>     <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-dod01.htm">    <title>Department of Defense Selected Acquisition Reports (SARs) (As of December 31, 2014)</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-dod01.htm</link>    <description>The Department of Defense (DoD) has released details on major defense acquisition program cost, schedule, and performance changes since the December 2013 reporting period. This information is based on the Selected Acquisition Reports (SARs) submitted to the Congress for the December 2014 reporting period. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-dod02.htm">    <title>DOD Announces Departure of Undersecretary Dr. Michael Vickers</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-dod02.htm</link>    <description>Under Secretary of Defense for Intelligence Dr. Michael Vickers notified President Barack Obama and Secretary of Defense Ash Carter that he will be retiring from federal service, and leave the Department of Defense, effective April 30. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-afps01.htm">    <title>Army, Air Force Leaders Warn Congress Against Further Cuts</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-afps01.htm</link>    <description>With growing threats to both the homeland and global stability, now is not the time to reduce capability and capacity, Army and Air Force leaders told Congress yesterday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-afps02.htm">    <title>Guard Leaders Testify on Fiscal Realities, Readiness</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-afps02.htm</link>    <description>The nation's investment in the National Guard transformed it into a premier operational force, but sequestration spending cuts scheduled to begin Oct. 1 will create challenges, the chief of the National Guard Bureau said during a congressional hearing this week. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-afps03.htm">    <title>Army Commander in Europe Details Assurance Efforts</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-afps03.htm</link>    <description>Thirteen months after Russia began its occupation of Crimea, the United States and its European allies must remain steadfast against the threat such actions pose, the commander of U.S. Army Europe said here this week. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-afps04.htm">    <title>Special Operations Leaders Voice Sequestration Concerns</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-afps04.htm</link>    <description>Challenges caused by limited resources, fiscal uncertainty and the changing nature of threats have forced the military's special operations forces to operate creatively, the Defense Department's top special operations officials told Congress yesterday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-afps05.htm">    <title>Pentagon Prepares to Unveil Better Buying Power 3.0</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-afps05.htm</link>    <description>Pentagon officials are preparing to unveil the latest version of Better Buying Power, a multibillion-dollar equipment and service-buying program aimed at improving the acquisition process while maintaining the nation's significant technological edge on the battlefield, the department's chief acquisition officer said here yesterday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-mcn01.htm">    <title>II Marine Expiditionary Force Headquarters Group conducts FEX to ensure proficency</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-mcn01.htm</link>    <description> Marines and sailors with II MEF Headquarters Group gathered with various units within II Marine Expeditionary Force to conduct a field exercise aboard Marine Corps Base Camp Lejeune, North Carolina, March 12-19, 2015. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-nns01.htm">    <title>DESRON 7 Completes Sea Combat Commander Training Ahead of Upcoming Warfighting Exercises, CARAT</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-nns01.htm</link>    <description>Destroyer Squadron 7 staff completed the Sea Combat Commander (SCC) course taught by instructors from Tactical Training Group, Pacific, March 19. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-nns02.htm">    <title>NMCB 3 Trains for Airfield Damage Repair</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-nns02.htm</link>    <description>Seabees, assigned to Naval Mobile Construction Battalion (NMCB) 3's Airfield Damage Repair (ADR) team, took part in a timed and graded training exercise at Port Hueneme Naval Base Ventura County, March 15. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-nns03.htm">    <title>New 3D-Simulator Generates Training, Expertise on Subs</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-nns03.htm</link>    <description>A new diesel generator simulator has been delivered to Pearl Harbor naval facilities by the TechSolutions program at the Office of Naval Research (ONR), officials at ONR announced March 18. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-presstv01.htm">    <title>Sweden to buy new submarines following suspected incursion</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-presstv01.htm</link>    <description>Sweden says it has decided to order two new submarines in an attempt to reinforce its armed forces months after a futile hunt by Sweden's navy for an alleged mini-sub in the Stockholm archipelago. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-rferl01.htm">    <title>Defense Minister Says Moldova Must Be Ready To Counter 'Hybrid War'</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-rferl01.htm</link>    <description>Moldova's defense Minister has said that his country must be prepared to deal with the threats posed by 'hybrid' warfare, a reference to tactics Russia is widely accused of employing in Ukraine. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-sputnik01.htm">    <title>Finnish Foreign Minister Frustrated Over NATO Military Buildup in Baltic</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-sputnik01.htm</link>    <description>Finnish Foreign Affairs Minister Erkki Tuomioja voiced his frustration over the buildup of NATO military forces in the Baltic, adding that while he disagrees with elements of Russian security policy, he understands the logic behind it. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/ukraine/2015/ukraine-150319-presstv01.htm">    <title>UK sends military trainers to Ukraine to help in fight against militias</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/ukraine/2015/ukraine-150319-presstv01.htm</link>    <description>Britain has sent military personnel to Ukraine to help its army fight against pro-Russian militias in the country's volatile east. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-sputnik01.htm">    <title>New Russian Plane Will Be Able to Deploy Army Globally in 7 Hours by 2024</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-sputnik01.htm</link>    <description>Russia plans to build a fleet of supersonic military transport aircraft with an unprecedented payload of 220 tons capable of deploying a full-fledged armored army to anywhere in the world in seven hours, Expert Online reported Thursday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-sputnik02.htm">    <title>Russia's Advanced Combat Gear to Be Equipped With Drone Connectible Kit</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-sputnik02.htm</link>    <description>Russia's state-of-the-art Ratnik (Warrior) infantry combat outfit will be equipped with a special kit to help soldiers connect to drones in order to obtain intelligence data. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-sputnik03.htm">    <title>Russian Nuclear Submarines Step Up Patrols Over Past Year - Navy Commander</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-sputnik03.htm</link>    <description>The number of patrols by Russian submarines, including nuclear ones, has risen by 50 percent over the past 15 months, Russian Navy Commander Adm. Viktor Chirkov said Thursday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-sputnik04.htm">    <title>Hidden Potential: Russia Builds Two More Submarines</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-sputnik04.htm</link>    <description>The multirole Yasen-class nuclear sub Arkhangelsk and the diesel-electric Lada-class Velikiye Luki have been laid down as part of Submariners' Day celebrations. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-sputnik05.htm">    <title>Russian Strategic Bombers Conduct Drills in Arctic Circle</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-sputnik05.htm</link>    <description>Russian Tu-95MS bombers have started exercises in Russia's Arctic North to test the combat readiness of the country's air defense alert force. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass01.htm">    <title>Russia lays down 5th Yasen-class submarine</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass01.htm</link>    <description>A new-generation nuclear-powered submarine of the Yasen-M project was laid down at the Sevmash shipyard in Severodvinsk in northern Russia on Thursday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass02.htm">    <title>Russia starts developing 5th-generation submarines &ndash; Navy chief</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass02.htm</link>    <description>The Russian Navy gave the defense industry an assignment to develop 5th-generation submarines, Navy Chief Viktor Chirkov said on Thursday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass03.htm">    <title>Russia's military drills in South Ossetia not linked with alliance treaty &ndash; Kremlin</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass03.htm</link>    <description>Maneuvers at the Russian military base in South Ossetia are not linked with the Treaty on Alliance and Integration, signed on Wednesday, Russian presidential press secretary Dmitry Peskov said on Thursday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass04.htm">    <title>Russia's Su-30 fighters upgraded to carry supersonic cruise missiles</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass04.htm</link>    <description>Russian Sukhoi Su-30 (Flanker-C) multirole fighter jets are getting an upgrade to carry supersonic cruise missiles. The planes will be modernized both for the Russian Air Force and the Indian military aviation. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass05.htm">    <title>Russia to upgrade 10 multi-purpose nuclear submarines by 2020 &ndash; Navy chief</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass05.htm</link>    <description>Russia's Zvyozdochka shipyard in the country's northwest and the Zvezda Far Eastern plant will be able to modernize about ten project 971 and project 949A nuclear submarines, Russian Navy Commander-in-Chief Vladimir Chirkov said on Thursday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass06.htm">    <title>Russia's strategic command and staff drills gain momentum</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass06.htm</link>    <description>Russia's command and staff exercises are gaining momentum along with a snap check of troops' combat readiness that kicked off on March 16 and will end on March 21. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass07.htm">    <title>Russian army combat readiness check no muscle flexing &ndash; Defense Ministry</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/russia/2015/russia-150319-tass07.htm</link>    <description>The snap check of combat readiness in Russia's Armed Forces is maximally open and is taking place only in Russian territory, Deputy Defense Minister Anatoly Antonov said on Thursday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/turkey/turkey-150319-pdo01.htm">    <title>Missile sale to Turkey confirmed</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/turkey/turkey-150319-pdo01.htm</link>    <description> China confirmed an agreement to sell the HQ-9 air defense missile system to Turkey on Tuesday, during the Langkawi International Maritime and Aerospace exhibition in Malaysia. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/china/2015/china-150319-pdo01.htm">    <title>Chinese naval fleet returns from Somali waters</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/china/2015/china-150319-pdo01.htm</link>    <description>After more than seven months at sea, covering more than 110,000 nautical miles, a Chinese fleet wrapped up its escort mission on Thursday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/china/2015/china-150319-pdo02.htm">    <title>China's arms exports doesn't violate rules</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/china/2015/china-150319-pdo02.htm</link>    <description>Some countries have created an uproar over China's arms trade following the Stockholm International Peace Research Institute's report on global arms sales because they have ulterior motives. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/china/2015/china-150319-pdo03.htm">    <title>The new US maritime strategy shows its two sides to China</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/china/2015/china-150319-pdo03.htm</link>    <description>On March 13, the U.S. Navy, U.S. Coast Guard, and U.S. Marine Corps released a revised maritime strategy entitled "A Cooperative Strategy for 21st Century Seapower". The document was published in seven languages, including a simplified Chinese version. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/ukraine/2015/ukraine-150319-rferl01.htm">    <title>Biden, Poroshenko Agree On Russia Sanction Action</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/ukraine/2015/ukraine-150319-rferl01.htm</link>    <description>U.S. Vice President Joe Biden and Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko have agreed that the future of sanctions against Russia must be linked to the full implementation of a peace agreement reached last month in Minsk. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/iraq/2015/iraq-150319-presstv01.htm">    <title>ISIL kills 18 members over contacts with Kurdish fighters</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/iraq/2015/iraq-150319-presstv01.htm</link>    <description>The Takfiri ISIL militant group has reportedly executed 13 of its own members in Iraq's northern oil-rich province of Kirkuk who contacted Kurdish Peshmerga forces and planned to surrender. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/iraq/2015/iraq-150319-sputnik01.htm">    <title>ICC Should Investigate Crimes Committed in Iraq - UN</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/iraq/2015/iraq-150319-sputnik01.htm</link>    <description>The UN Human Rights Office urged the Security Council to 'address, in the strongest terms, information that points to genocide, crimes against humanity and war crimes' in Iraq. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/iraq/2015/iraq-150319-unnews01.htm">    <title>ISIL may have committed genocide, war crimes in Iraq, says UN human rights report</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/iraq/2015/iraq-150319-unnews01.htm</link>    <description>A report released today by the United Nations human rights office says that the so-called Islamic State in Iraq and the Levant (ISIL) may have committed genocide, war crimes and crimes against humanity in its attacks against ethnic and religious groups in the country. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/iraq/2015/iraq-150319-voa01.htm">    <title>UN: IS May Have Committed War Crimes in Iraq</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/iraq/2015/iraq-150319-voa01.htm</link>    <description>A new United Nations report finds the Islamic State (IS) group may be guilty of war crimes, crimes against humanity and genocide. The report lists wide-ranging atrocities committed by the IS in Iraq between June 2014 to February 2015. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-presstv02.htm">    <title>Al-Qaeda claims assassination of top Houthi member</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-presstv02.htm</link>    <description>A branch of al-Qaeda in Yemen has claimed responsibility for the assassination of a senior member of Yemen's Houthi Ansarullah movement in the capital city of Sana'a. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/israel/israel-150319-voa01.htm">    <title>Netanyahu: Israel, US Each Other's Greatest Allies</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/israel/israel-150319-voa01.htm</link>    <description>Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says the United States and Israel are each other's greatest allies and have no choice but to work together. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/intell/library/news/2015/intell-150319-presstv01.htm">    <title>France unveils new rules on mass communication surveillance</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/intell/library/news/2015/intell-150319-presstv01.htm</link>    <description>The French prime minister has unveiled a set of phone and internet spying rules against suspected terrorists, saying the country has never faced so great a terrorist threat. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/intell/library/news/2015/intell-150319-voa01.htm">    <title>French Bill Aims to Broaden Surveillance Powers</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/intell/library/news/2015/intell-150319-voa01.htm</link>    <description>Two months after the Paris shootings, and a day after attacks across the Mediterranean Sea in Tunisia, France has unveiled new legislation to eavesdrop on potential jihadists and other terrorist suspects. Some groups are concerned it may threaten civil liberties. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/intell/library/news/2015/intell-150319-sputnik01.htm">    <title>US Military Says 'Yes' to Buying Israeli-Made Spy Balloon</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/intell/library/news/2015/intell-150319-sputnik01.htm</link>    <description>The US military said that they had approved the purchase of the Skystar 180, an Israeli-made surveillance aerostat. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/iran/2015/iran-150319-presstv01.htm">    <title>No nuclear deal unless agreement reached on 'everything': Iran diplomat</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/iran/2015/iran-150319-presstv01.htm</link>    <description>A senior Iranian nuclear negotiator says Tehran and the P5+1 group need to agree "on everything" during their discussions in order to strike a binding comprehensive accord on Tehran's nuclear program. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/security/library/news/2015/03/sec-150319-irin01.htm">    <title>Beyond the outbreak: leading expert on what the Ebola crisis can teach us</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/security/library/news/2015/03/sec-150319-irin01.htm</link>    <description>New cases of Ebola are now tailing off in Liberia and Sierra Leone, and research scientists are racing against time to learn as much as possible about what is normally a rare disease. One of those scientists is Dr Jimmy Whitworth, who has just taken up a new post as professor of international public health at the London School of Hygiene</description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/security/library/news/2015/03/sec-150319-presstv01.htm">    <title>Sierra Leone to lockdown 2.5 mn to stem Ebola crisis</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/security/library/news/2015/03/sec-150319-presstv01.htm</link>    <description>Sierra Leone has announced plans to confine nearly 2.5 million of people to their homes across the capital of Freetown as well as in north of the country for three days in a bid to curtail the deadly Ebola epidemic. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/security/library/news/2015/03/sec-150319-voa02.htm">    <title>Islamic State Claims Attack at Tunisia Museum</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/security/library/news/2015/03/sec-150319-voa02.htm</link>    <description>The Islamic State group claimed responsibility Thursday for the deadly attack on Tunisia's national museum that killed 23 people, mostly foreign tourists. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/pakistan/2015/pakistan-150319-irin01.htm">    <title>What terrorism does: Fear and anger for Christians after Pakistan bombs</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/pakistan/2015/pakistan-150319-irin01.htm</link>    <description>Fears are running high in the homes of the over 70,000 Christians in Youhanabad, a settlement in Lahore - the capital of Pakistan's populous Punjab province. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-rferl02.htm">    <title>Tajik Leader Calls For 'Secular' Development Concept</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-rferl02.htm</link>    <description>Tajik President Emomali Rahmon has called on prominent citizens in the Central Asian nation to outline a long-term 'national development concept' that would establish a 'democratic and secular country based on the rule of law.' </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-rferl03.htm">    <title>Obama Urged To Recognize Mass Killings Of Armenians As Genocide</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-rferl03.htm</link>    <description>Members of the U.S. House of Representatives introduced a resolution on March 18 urging President Barack Obama to recognize the mass killing of Armenians by Ottoman soldiers during World War I as genocide. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-rferl04.htm">    <title>Explainer: Many Winners, But Some Big Losers As Oil Prices Drop</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-rferl04.htm</link>    <description>The price of oil has fallen 60 percent in less than a year. Earlier this month, it looked as if that collapse might have ended with a brief recovery, but this week prices began slumping once again. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/china/2015/china-150319-pdo04.htm">    <title>China Voice: China-proposed AIIB is a gift to world</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/china/2015/china-150319-pdo04.htm</link>    <description>As countries continue filing applications to join the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB), the eagerness for participation indicates an unmet niche for such a service. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/china/2015/china-150319-pdo05.htm">    <title>More EU members to join China-led AIIB bank</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/china/2015/china-150319-pdo05.htm</link>    <description>The president of the European Parliament, Martin Schulz, on Tuesday welcomed the planned participation of a number of EU nations in Asia Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB). </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T20:31:30Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/security/library/news/2015/03/sec-150319-voa01.htm">    <title>Tunisian Parliament Calls Day of Solidarity After Deadly Attack</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/security/library/news/2015/03/sec-150319-voa01.htm</link>    <description>Tunisia's parliament called for a day of solidarity after gunmen opened fire at one of the capital's top tourism sites, killing 19 people and wounding more than 40 others. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T07:38:36Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-voa01.htm">    <title>Thai Supreme Court Allows Criminal Case Against Former PM</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150319-voa01.htm</link>    <description>Thailand's Supreme Court ruled Thursday that a criminal case against the country's last elected prime minister could proceed. If convicted, Yingluck Shinawatra could be imprisoned for a decade. Her supporters see this as part of the junta's campaign to permanently eliminate the Shinawatra clan from Thai politics. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T07:38:33Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150318-voa06.htm">    <title>Pentagon: Al-Shabab's Garaar Killed by Drone Strike in Somalia</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150318-voa06.htm</link>    <description>A U.S. drone strike in southern Somalia last week killed a leader of the Islamist militant group al-Shabab, the Pentagon confirmed on Wednesday. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T07:38:33Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/security/library/news/2015/03/sec-150318-unnews01.htm">    <title>UN officials condemn deadly attack on Tunisia's Bardo Museum</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/security/library/news/2015/03/sec-150318-unnews01.htm</link>    <description>Senior United Nations officials have condemned today's attack against the Bardo Museum in the Tunisian capital which resulted in a number of deaths, and voiced solidarity with the Government and people of the North African nation. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T07:38:36Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150318-afns01.htm">    <title>New York Army National Guard aviators train with Air Guard close air controllers at Fort Drum</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150318-afns01.htm</link>    <description>It was one team, one fight during a training exercise March 14 for the New York Army National Guard aviators of B Company 3rd Battalion 126th Aviation and the New York Air National Guard close air support specialists of the 274th Air Support Operations Squadron. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T07:38:33Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150318-mcn02.htm">    <title>Cutting edge; U.S. Marine, Army special forces prepare for crisis scenarios</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150318-mcn02.htm</link>    <description>After nearly two weeks of constant training, the Marines of Special-Purpose Marine Air-Ground Task Force Crisis Response-Africa locked down a perimeter in Baumholder, Germany, March 11. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T07:38:33Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/libya/2015/libya-150318-unnews01.htm">    <title>UN chief urges more global support to resolve Libya crisis as he meets with Italian leaders</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/libya/2015/libya-150318-unnews01.htm</link>    <description>Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon today stressed the importance of international support as the United Nations seeks to promote dialogue to resolve the crisis in Libya, as he met with senior Italian officials in Rome. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T07:38:38Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150318-unnews01.htm">    <title>In Nigeria, UN political chief hails 'noteworthy' progress as country prepares to vote</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150318-unnews01.htm</link>    <description>Nigeria has made "noteworthy" progress in the preparations for the upcoming elections, the top United Nations political official said today, as he wrapped up a visit to the country, whose citizens will head to the polls beginning on 28 March. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T07:38:33Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150318-unnews02.htm">    <title>Haiti making 'measurable gains' towards 2015 elections, UN envoy tells Security Council</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/library/news/2015/03/mil-150318-unnews02.htm</link>    <description>The Government of Haiti has made progress towards the holding of elections critical for the country's stability and development, the top United Nations official in the Caribbean nation told the Security Council today. </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T07:38:33Z</dc:date> </item> <item rdf:about="http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/myanmar/myanmar-150318-unnews01.htm">    <title>UN rights expert urges Myanmar authorities to address signs of backtracking</title>    <link>http://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/library/news/myanmar/myanmar-150318-unnews01.htm</link>    <description>The United Nations Special Rapporteur on the human rights situation in Myanmar today called on the country's authorities to address ongoing challenges to the democratic reform process "before they undermine the success achieved so far." </description>    <dc:date>2015-03-19T07:38:38Z</dc:date> </item>  </rdf:RDF>  <!-- LastWebmasterBuildDate: Thu, 19 Mar 2015 20:51:05 GMT --> <!-- LastBuildDate: Thu, 19 Mar 2015 20:51:05 GMT --> <!--
